title: My Unruly Mop of Hair
description: My Unruly Mop of Hair is a fun new story full of imagination and amazing hairstylesSuzie has a big, out-there, most certainly unruly mop of hair - and she loves it!Sometimes Suzie's hair can be swirled up like ice cream, or stuck straight up on end like a porcupine...and more!Have a look and see...
author: Katie Katay
